"use client" import { useState } from "react" import { ChevronLeftIcon, ChevronRightIcon, RotateCwIcon } from "lucide-react" import { WebPreview, WebPreviewBody, WebPreviewConsole, WebPreviewNavigation, WebPreviewNavigationButton, WebPreviewUrl, } from "@/registry/new-york-v4/ai-elements/web-preview" export default function WebPreviewDemo() { const [url, setUrl] = useState("https://ai-sdk.dev") const [logs] = useState([ { level: "log" as const, message: "Page loaded successfully", timestamp: new Date(), }, { level: "log" as const, message: "Ready to display content", timestamp: new Date(), }, ]) return (
) }
